The first series of programs carried cm the tape network ms a series of
seven broadcasts entitled me Human Beings« produced by the Lowell Institute
Cooperative Broadcasting Council of Boston. Recognising that program titles
do not fully identify program content it may be useful, nevertheless, to
list broadcast subjects within several of the program series.
